user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip with my friends and we want to minimize our environmental impact. Can you recommend some eco-friendly hiking trails in the area? Additionally, suggest some camping gear that is both durable and sustainable.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of eco-friendly hiking trails in the specified area.
Gather information on durable and sustainable camping gear options.
Create a combined report containing the recommended eco-friendly hiking trails and sustainable camping gear suggestions.
